description: Daenerys or Jon Snow? Diffusion of news through Twitter? JFK, ORD or ATL, do these codes look familiar? In this tutorial we build up on the fundamentals of Part 1 tutorial and look at various applications of network analysis to real world datasets like the US Airport Dataset, Game of Thrones character co-occurrence network, and foray into diffusion processes on networks.
title: Network Analysis Made Simple: Part II
